message.content: {"given_definition_quality":45,"better_definition":"child; kid","sentence":"孩子在家。","image_prompt":"A small child sitting inside a simple home, with soft lighting and minimal furniture. The child looks happy and safe inside the house, with a visible contrast between inside and a faintly altered world outside the window.","sentence_translation":"The child is at home."}
